message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe you'll find very valuable. I'm asking for $13,500.  I think it's a fair price considering the benefits it will bring you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
Bob, I understand your position, but the value this product brings to the table is significant. How about we meet in the middle at $12,000? This considers both our interests.
I understand your point about the product's value, but I'm still a bit hesitant. How about we try $10,500? I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer.
